Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2013 03:36PM claireship1 wrote: Superficial but important. When my hair grew back fluffy and pathetic I shaved it all off again which seemed to help. Also I take glucosamine and condroitin for my clicky knees and I think the proteins in that help. It has now gone back to normal and I have lost the chemo curl which I did not like. (Having been perfectly happy with dead straight hair). My eyebrows and lashes are a bit pathetic compared with before but make up sorts that out.
Posts.Title: In shock bennymuffins websister
